sentences.en: Accompany by media, CBA improved its pleasing to eyes , and its art.
sentences.cn: 在媒体陪伴发展的十年中, CBA联赛的观赏性 、 技艺性得到了很大的提高.

sentences.en: At the same time, cba believe that after such a storm, have been tested and tempered.
sentences.cn: 与此同时, 相信cba经过这样一次风波之后, 也得到了考验和锻炼.

sentences.en: Cba as the league's management agency the league can not challenge the legality of the Commission.
sentences.cn: 作为cba联赛的管理机构,联赛委员会的合法性不容挑战.

sentences.en: Generally , the validity of regulation is interpreted by the Cost - Benefit Analysis ( CBA ) method.
sentences.cn: 利用成本 - 收益的方法说明管制供给的有效性.

sentences.en: I think it's quite good for professional sports especially the CBA clubs development since he has set a good example.
sentences.cn: 我认为，自从他树立了一个好榜样之后，对职业运动，特别是CBA俱乐部的发展来说，是相当好的。

sentences.en: Many players, coaches, executives, and referees have honed their skills in the CBA before going on to NBA careers.
sentences.cn: 很多运动员 、 教练 、 执行官和裁判在转入NBA职业比赛之前,已在CBA经过了磨练.

sentences.en: Method of the environmental benefits measurement is cost -- benefit analysis ( CBA ).
sentences.cn: 房地产开发中环境利益衡量的方法是成本 —— 收益分析 ( CBA ).

sentences.en: NBA's official development league is the Continental Basketball Association ( CBA ).
sentences.cn: nba的官方开发联盟是大陆篮球协会 ( cba ).

sentences.en: Nicholas : Hey , CBA is one of our most important clients. I see why you're nervous.
sentences.cn: 嘿, CBA是我们最重要的客户之一. 我理解你坐不安的原因.

sentences.en: Shanghai basketball team won the CBA champion and he was rewarded the best member award.
sentences.cn: 上海篮球队赢得CBA冠军,他被选为最佳球员奖.

sentences.en: The NBA's official development league is the Continental Basketball Association ( CBA ).
sentences.cn: nba的官方开发联盟是大陆篮球协会 ( CBA ).

sentences.en: Yi gets happy, Bucks happy, Tigers happy, CBA happy, NBA happy all the more.
sentences.cn: 阿联高兴 、 雄鹿高兴 、 宏远高兴 、 中国篮协高兴, NBA当然更高兴.
